import { Button, Form, Icon, Message, Grid, Header } from 'semantic-ui-react'; const SignupComponent = () => { const headerStyle = { textAlign: 'center' } const subHeaderStyle = { paddingLeft: 30, paddingRight: 30, paddingTop: 15, color: 'grey' } return (
Comics Ghor A Canvas to Paint Your Mind Out Welcome to Comics Ghor, a Bangladeshi website. The purpose of Comics Ghor is to create a free platform for all the Bangladeshi people, of all age, who desire to draw comics or write novels, stories or more.

) } export default SignupComponent;
